overview: In this heartfelt dramedy two coworkers who don't like each other are forced to carpool together in order to make it home for Christmas. A series of unfortunate events forces them to cooperate in closer quarters than neither would like.  Director Brittany Benedict Writers Brittany BenedictDemian Alan Mancino Stars Dylan JaegerDemian Alan MancinoAmanda Beane
title: The Bright side
